results.title: NDMA formation during ozonation of metformin: Roles of ozone and hydroxyl radicals.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, a high-consumed pharmaceutical for @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@, has been reported to generate @<m>DISEASE_Precancerous_Conditions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011230 @@@carcinogenic@@@ @CHEMICAL_Dimethylnitrosamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004128 @@@nitroso-dimethylamine@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Dimethylnitrosamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004128 @@@NDMA@@@) during treatment of its containing wastewater.

citations.NLM: Liao X, Shen L, Jiang Z, Gao M, Qiu Y, Qi H, Chen C. NDMA formation during ozonation of metformin: Roles of ozone and hydroxyl radicals. Sci Total Environ. 2021 Nov 20;796():149010. PMID: 34280626

results.title: Preneoplastic cells switch to Warburg metabolism from their inception exposing multiple vulnerabilities for targeted elimination
results.text_hl: OXPHOS is impaired in PNCs and complex I inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ suppresses @<m>DISEASE_Precancerous_Conditions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011230 @@@PNC@@@ proliferation and induces @<m>DISEASE_Precancerous_Conditions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011230 @@@PNC@@@ apoptosis in vivo.

citations.NLM: Myllymäki H, Kelly L, Elliot AM, Carter RN, Johansson JA, Chang KY, Cholewa-Waclaw J, Morton NM, Feng Y. Preneoplastic cells switch to Warburg metabolism from their inception exposing multiple vulnerabilities for targeted elimination Oncogenesis. 2024 Jan 25;13(1):7. PMID: 38272902

results.title: Metformin represses the carcinogenesis potentially induced by 50 Hz magnetic fields in aged mouse fibroblasts via inhibition of NF-kB.
results.text_hl: These findings suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ treatment suppresses the @<m>DISEASE_Precancerous_Conditions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011230 @@@carcinogenic@@@ potential of 50 Hz MFs in aged @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ fibroblasts, possibly through modulation of NF-kB activation and epithelial-mesenchymal transition modulation.

citations.NLM: Soydas T, Yenmis G, Tuncdemir M, Kalkan MT, Sarac EY, Bilir A, Sultuybek GK. Metformin represses the carcinogenesis potentially induced by 50 Hz magnetic fields in aged mouse fibroblasts via inhibition of NF-kB. J Cell Mol Med. 2024 Oct;28(19):e70132. PMID: 39350724

results.title: Li-Fraumeni Syndrome: Narrative Review Through a Case Report with Ten Years of Primary Tumor Remission Associated with Sechium H387 07 Supplementation.
results.text_hl: Recently, protocols involving @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as a prophylactic medication have been developed to target @<m>DISEASE_Precancerous_Conditions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011230 @@@precancerous@@@ niches.

results.title: Exploring New Drug Targets for Type 2 Diabetes: Success, Challenges and Opportunities
results.text_hl: Nevertheless, troubling developments and fresh challenges are still evident. Recently, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, the most widely used first-line drug for @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@, was found to contain a @<m>DISEASE_Precancerous_Conditions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011230 @@@carcinogenic@@@ contaminant known as @CHEMICAL_Dimethylnitrosamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004128 @@@N-nitroso dimethylamine@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Dimethylnitrosamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004128 @@@NDMA@@@).

citations.NLM: Kanwal A, Kanwar N, Bharati S, Srivastava P, Singh SP, Amar S. Exploring New Drug Targets for Type 2 Diabetes: Success, Challenges and Opportunities Biomedicines. 2022 Jan 31;10(2):. PMID: 35203540

results.title: Application of capillary electrophoresis-nano-electrospray ionization-mass spectrometry for the determination of N-nitrosodimethylamine in pharmaceuticals.
results.text_hl: After a presence of highly hepatotoxic and potentially @<m>DISEASE_Precancerous_Conditions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011230 @@@carcinogenic@@@ @CHEMICAL_Dimethylnitrosamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004128 @@@N-nitrosodimethylamine@@@ was detected in certain lots of sartan, @CHEMICAL_Ranitidine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011899 @@@ranitidine@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, and other pharmaceuticals, local regulatory authorities issued recalls of suspected products, and concerns of the pharmacotherapy safety were widely discussed.

citations.NLM: Řemínek R, Foret F, Chung DS. Application of capillary electrophoresis-nano-electrospray ionization-mass spectrometry for the determination of N-nitrosodimethylamine in pharmaceuticals. Electrophoresis. 2021 Feb;42(4):334-341. PMID: 33368407

results.title: Metformin and neoplasia: implications and indications.
results.text_hl: This review article discusses the epidemiological studies and examines the possible mechanisms by which @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ exerts its anti-@<m>DISEASE_Precancerous_Conditions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011230 @@@carcinogenic@@@ activities in @DISEASE_Ovarian_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D010051 @@@breast, colon, ovarian, lung, and prostate cancers@@@.

results.title: Modulation by metformin of molecular and histopathological alterations in the lung of cigarette smoke-exposed mice
results.text_hl: In conclusion, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was able to protect the @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ lung from smoke-induced @DISEASE_DNA_Virus_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D004266 @@@DNA@@@ and microRNA alterations and to inhibit @<m>DISEASE_Precancerous_Conditions</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011230 @@@preneoplastic lesions@@@ in lung and @DISEASE_Kidney_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007674 @@@kidney@@@ but failed to prevent @DISEASE_Lung_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008171 @@@lung adenomas@@@ and @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@malignant tumors@@@ induced by this complex mixture.

Modulation by metformin of molecular and histopathological alterations in the lung of cigarette smoke-exposed mice Cancer Med. 2014 Jun;3(3):719-30. PMID: 24683044
